title: Guardian - Conciliator Set Card 1 of 14
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace "to 0" with by 2.

Elder's notes: While this change may seem small on its face, it makes a big difference when used in conjunction with certain cards that are very powerful against beings with 0 presence. We want our 3+ presence beings to feel like difficult challenges to overcome. This version is still useful against those beings, without completely nullifying them.
